sentence: School board member Charlotte Joyce is introducing a resolution to support Governor Ron DeSantis controversial Parental Rights in Education law.
author: Jessica Barreto
title: Hurting gay and trans kids: Dont Say Gay bill up for discussion at tonights DCPS meeting
